title: GTA Online: Money Fronts
headline: GTA Online: Money Fronts
subtitle: Money Laundering Work
content:
Make some extra GTA$ and RP by posing as security, infiltrating a bank, fighting your way past enemies, and stealing a car lined with cash, among other illicit activities.

Improve your chances of success by involving your organization members and theyâ€™ll receive a participation bonus.

Purchase the new properties from Maze Bank Foreclosures and get started from the laptop found in the office or call Raf De Angelis.
